page.title: 07LITTLE MORTON FARM
page.content: LITTLE MORTON FARM IS OWNED BY MR AND MRS HOWARD, MRS HOWARD IS AT PRESENT CHAIRPERSON OF THE GOVERNORS OF RANBY PRIMARY SCHOOL.THEY PYCHASED THE LAND IN 1948,MR HOWARD HAVING WORKED THE LAND SINCE1938.THE ORIGINAL SIZE OF THE FARM WAS 489 ACRES AND THIS PRESENT BLOCK IS NOW 750 ACRES.THE MAIN CROPS ARE SUGAR BEET WHICH GOES TO THE BRITISH SUGAR CORP.AT NEWARK,POTATOES WHICH GO TO WALKERS CRISPS,BARLEY WHICH GOES DEPENDING ON QUALITY FOR CATTLE FEED,WHEAT FOR FEED OR MILLING AND RAPE FOR OIL SEED COOKING OIL OR MARGARINE.THE SANDY SOIL HAS BEEN A CONSTANT PROBLEM AS THE WATER TABLE HAS DROPPED. A WELL 300 FEET DEEP NOW IRRIGATES THE WHOLE FARM. MAJOR CHANGE HAS SEEN THE WORKERS GIVE UP THE LAND FOR JOBS IN THE TOWN.THERE ARE ONLY 4 ASSISTANTS. A COMBINE HARVESTER WOULD COST Â£40000.
